creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Discontinuous supplementary weft patterning; wide red bands on sides, white center ground with figurative patterns of birds, animals? and double-headed eagles separated by geometric patterning. Figures are woven in color stripes of red, yellow, green, blue, and geometric patterning is woven in red and purple predominantly.
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
